section.title: Purpose
section.lines: Generate the java interfaces for MML Classes and Enumerations (used by components) Allow programmatic access of the meta-model

section.title: More information
section.p: Related cartridges: Java model, Service model, Java beans, Java model Serializer, Java beans Serializer, Model Serializer

section.title: Technologies
section.p: The code is generated using the JET (Java Emitter Template) Framework

body.section:
Where to find what
Plugin id: com.odcgroup.mdf.generation
Main class: com.odcgroup.mdf.generation.JavaModelGenerator
In mdf-core:
com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.ModelGeneratorFactory which uses the following JET templates:
Jet template Jet compiled template
DomainModelGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.DomainModelGenerator
ClassGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.ClassGenerator
ObjectIdGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.ObjectIdGenerator
ConfigurableObjectIdGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.ConfigurableObjectIdGenerator
EnumerationGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.EnumerationGenerator
DatasetGenerator.javajet com.odcgroup.mdf.transform.java.jet.DatasetGenerator
